name: The Insufferable Pan
description:
There is trouble in Mount Olympus. Persephone, the daughter of Zeus, has been taken to the Kingdom of Tartarus by Hades. It is up to Pan, the love-struck satyr to brave the underworld and rescue her. Use your agility, your wits, and your magic flute to rescue the princess!

CONTROLS

WASD , Arrow Keys, or DPAD to move

SPACEBAR or Gamepad Button 1 to Jump (hit twice to double-jump)

SHIFT or Gamepad Button 3 to walk lightly

F or Gamepad Button 2 to play your flute

Q or Gamepad Button 4 to break hearts

R or Gamepad SELECT to restart a room if you make a mistake.

Hints:Rats can climb walls!

Thank You for playing!
